context.rdfs:comment: A structured value representing a price or price range. Typically, only the subclasses of this type are used for markup. It is recommended to use MonetaryAmount to describe independent amounts of money such as a salary, credit card limits, etc.
context.rdfs:label: PriceSpecification

properties.rdfs:comment: The lowest price if the price is a range.
properties.rdfs:label: minPrice

properties.rdfs:comment: The highest price if the price is a range.
properties.rdfs:label: maxPrice

properties.rdfs:comment: Specifies whether the applicable value-added tax (VAT) is included in the price specification or not.
properties.rdfs:label: valueAddedTaxIncluded
